name: Bryn Shander
description: The largest of the Ten-Towns and unofficial capital. Population: 1,200.

details.speaker: Duvessa Shane
details.notable: Town Hall, The Northlook Inn, Blackiron Blades

name: Targos
description: Second largest town, known for fishing and rivalry with Bryn Shander. Population: 1,000.

details.speaker: Naerth Maxildanarr
details.notable: The Luskan Arms, Three Flags Sailing, Town Militia

name: Easthaven
description: Eastern town on Lac Dinneshere, starting point for many expeditions. Population: 750.

details.speaker: Danneth Waylen
details.notable: White Lady Inn, Easthaven Ferry, Town Hall

name: Caer-Dineval
description: Isolated town ruled by the mysterious Kadroth. Population: 100.

name: Caer-Konig
description: Northern town near Kelvin's Cairn. Population: 150.

details.speaker: Trovus
details.notable: The Northern Light inn, Hook, Line, and Sinker tavern

name: Termalaine
description: Mining town famous for its gem mines. Population: 600.

details.speaker: Oarus Masthew
details.notable: The Blue Clam tavern, Tourmaline mines

name: Lonelywood
description: Westernmost town, gateway to the Lonelywood forest. Population: 100.

details.speaker: Nimsy Huddle
details.notable: The Lucky Liar tavern, Ramshackle inn

name: Bremen
description: Small fishing town on the western shore. Population: 150.

name: Dougan's Hole
description: Smallest of the Ten-Towns. Population: 50.

name: Good Mead
description: Known for its honey mead brewery. Population: 100.

details.speaker: Kendrick Rielsbarrow
details.notable: The Mead Hall, Good Mead's brewery

name: Kelvin's Cairn
description: Tallest mountain in Icewind Dale, home to dwarven valley.

details.notable: Dwarven Valley, Mountain goats, Avalanche risks

name: Reghed Glacier
description: Massive glacier, beneath lies the lost city of Ythryn.

name: Maer Dualdon
description: Largest of the three lakes, deepest and most dangerous.

name: Lac Dinneshere
description: Eastern lake, known for excellent fishing.

details.notable: Caer on eastern shore, Good fishing spots

name: Redwaters
description: Smallest lake, named for iron deposits that tint the water.

name: Ythryn
description: Lost Netherese city buried in the Reghed Glacier.

name: Id Ascendant
description: Crashed nautiloid ship, now a mind flayer outpost.

name: Sunblight Fortress
description: Duergar fortress hidden in the mountains.

name: Tribe of the Elk
description: Nomadic Reghed tribe, friendly to outsiders.

name: Tribe of the Wolf
description: Aggressive Reghed tribe, hostile to outsiders.
